title: Site using both serif and sans fonts
content:
Hi all,

I’m looking for inspiration from websites that use both serif and sans-serif fonts to good effect.

Thanks

What is difference between it and Illustrator. THANKS ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006023914/http:/typophile.com/node/38358 "Go to next forum topic")
author: reboot

comments.content:
I’m looking for books with words in them :-P

Do a google search for “Web Typography”.

- Lex
